name: Precarious Atoms
description:
Electrons will jump up energy levels over time. Click on the electrons to send them back down a level. You earn more points the farther from the nucleus the electron is when clicked, but be careful. If the electrons get too far from the nucleus, the atom will become too unstable and explode! (totally scientifically accurate)

Music: https://mattjhart.itch.io/spiral-game-boy-music-rom
